description: If n = Product (p_j^k_j), a(n) = numerator of Sum 1/p_j^k_j.
links: K. Brockhaus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 06 2010]
formula: Fraction is additive with a(p^e) = 1/p^e.a(n) = sum(n/a141809(n,k): k=1..A001221(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
prog: (MAGMA) a028236:=func< k | k eq 1 select 1 else Numerator(&+[ f[i, 1]^-f[i,2]: i in [1..#f] ]) where f is Factorization(k) >; [ a028236(n):n in [1..82] ]; [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 06 2010](Haskell)a028236 n = sum $ map (div n) $ a141809_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
